scripts.truncate-local-db: mysql -Nse 'show tables' -D statster -ustatster -pstatster | while read table; do echo "SET FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS=0;truncate table $table;SET FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS=1;"; done | mysql statster -ustatster -pstatster
scripts.update-local-db: npm run get-latest-prod-db && npm run truncate-local-db && npm run populate-local-db && rm db-statster.info-$(date +"%Y-%m-%d").sql.bz2
